expression: #"Changed Types" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted Headers",{{"portfolio", Int64.Type}, {"createdtime", type datetime}, {"portfoliosid", Int64.Type}, {"portfolio_id", type text}, {"number", type text}, {"provider", Int64.Type}, {"portfolio_status", type text}, {"program", Int64.Type}, {"created_date", type date}, {"proposal_underwriter", Int64.Type}, {"total_number_of_claims", Int64.Type}, {"total_claim_value", type number}, {"adjusted_claim_value", type number}, {"total_number_accepted_claims", Int64.Type}, {"total_value_accepted_claims", type number}, {"total_adjusted_face_value", type number}, {"total_purchase_price", type number}, {"total_voluntary_collections", type number}, {"total_presuit_collections", type number}, {"total_litigated_collections", type number}, {"total_buybacks", type number}, {"total_profit", type number}, {"total_reserves_to_be_released", type number}, {"note", type text}, {"investor", Int64.Type}, {"approved_date", type date}, {"opened_date", type date}, {"closed_date", type date}, {"total_number_of_aob_claims", Int64.Type}, {"total_num_of_rejected_claims", Int64.Type}, {"total_value_of_rejected_claims", type number}, {"total_reserves_released", type number}, {"last_reserves_released_date", type date}, {"lock_automation", Int64.Type}, {"total_reserves", type number}, {"total_limit_reserve", type number}, {"refundable_reserve", type number}, {"portfolio_write_off", type number}, {"remaining_to_hurdle", type number}, {"total_balance_owed", type number}, {"total_collections", type number}, {"portfolio_approver_name", Int64.Type}, {"total_number_of_paid_claims", Int64.Type}, {"total_factor_fee", type number}, {"hurdle", type number}, {"hurdle_percent", type number}, {"total_number_of_buybacks", Int64.Type}}, "en-US"),
